mapper.select: select UUID, VERSION_ID VERSIONID, COMMIT_MSG COMMITMSG, COMMIT_DATE COMMITDATE from SVN.SVN_COMMIT_LOG where COMMIT_USER=#{user} and is_uat_commit='N'
select UUID, VERSION_ID VERSIONID, COMMIT_MSG COMMITMSG, COMMIT_DATE COMMITDATE from SVN.SVN_COMMIT_LOG where COMMIT_USER=#{user} and is_sc_commit='N'

select a.UUID, a.COMMIT_UUID COMMITUUID, to_char(a.COMMIT_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') PREPAREDATE, b.VERSION_ID VERSIONID, b.COMMIT_MSG COMMITMSG, b.COMMIT_DATE COMMITDATE from SVN_COMMIT_UAT a, SVN_COMMIT_LOG b where a.COMMIT_UUID=b.UUID and a.flag='Y' and a.COMMIT_USER=#{user}

select a.UUID, a.COMMIT_UUID COMMITUUID, to_char(a.COMMIT_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') PREPAREDATE, b.VERSION_ID VERSIONID, b.COMMIT_MSG COMMITMSG, b.COMMIT_DATE COMMITDATE from SVN_COMMIT_SC a, SVN_COMMIT_LOG b where a.COMMIT_UUID=b.UUID and a.flag='Y' and a.COMMIT_USER=#{user}
select file_type TYPE, file_url FILEURL from SVN_COMMIT_FILE where version_id=#{version}
